quote: Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others. – Lolly Daskal
fact: Tom Sawyer was the first novel written on a typewriter.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I had a pair of racing snails. I removed their shells to make them more aerodynamic, but they became sluggish.
